entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • "Permission denied" when running `dotnet script` if the current working directory contains a file named `dotnet` #25551
  • installed global tool is missing #25767
    Discussion
  • Compiler crashing when using !! (Bang-Bang-Operator) in async methods #24905
  • Wow, that looks bad! I don't have time at the moment to investigate, but thanks for reporting. I'll try to look at it soon. #26418

Updated

  • Problems in .NET 6 Cross Platform Build for win, linux and mac(x64 & arm64) #25446
    Discussion
  • Building net*-android apps always restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux #25679
    Discussion
  • WPF publish adds Windows Forms dlls (including design time dlls) #25869
  • Consider specifying ResolvableSdkPattern in MSBuild sdk resolvers' manifests. #26009
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent perms on some directories SDK writes into /tmp #26022
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet pack replaces wildcard version of reference with current actual version #26167
  • Create FabricBot rule for compat issues #26166
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet run fails if run from a directory named `;)` #13954
    Backlog
  • Missing packages for Ubuntu 21.04 aarch64/arm64 #17683
    Discussion
  • `build` vs `publish` -- can they be friends? #26247
  • New project system doesn't copy PDBs from packages #1458
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1862266 #26442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #26441
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26440
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remoev the build retry and increase the test retry #26439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove all of the extra run helix tests scripts for running non-helix… #26438
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Update branding to 6.0.108 #26435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.422 #26434
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.303 #26436
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Delete unnecessary test project files #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [QB Mode] Fix Workload Restore Crashes #26405
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4xx
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
